gmv.aggregation_operation: sum(case when data_order_id is not null then cast(data_value as double) else 0 end)
gmv.name: gmv

total_ad_clicks.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when referrer_by_category = 'Ad Campaigns' then coalesce(search_fbclid,search_gclid,clickid) else null end)
total_ad_clicks.name: total_ad_clicks

total_addpaymentinfo.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'AddPaymentInfo' and regexp_like(page, '^.*(payment).*') then page else null end)
total_addpaymentinfo.name: total_addpaymentinfo

total_addshippinginfo.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'AddShippingInfo' and regexp_like(page, '^.*(shipping).*') then page else null end)
total_addshippinginfo.name: total_addshippinginfo

total_addtocarts.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'AddToCart' and regexp_like(page, '^.*(products|product).*') then page else null end)
total_addtocarts.name: total_addtocarts

total_blog_page_view.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'PageView' and regexp_like(page_path , '^.*(blog).*') then page else null end)
total_blog_page_view.name: total_blog_page_view

total_collection_page_views.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'PageView' and regexp_like(page, '^.*(collection|collections).*') then page else null end)
total_collection_page_views.name: total_collection_page_views

total_cpc_clicks.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when referrer_by_type in ('cpc','cpc#btn-buy-now') then coalesce(search_fbclid,search_gclid,clickid) else null end)
total_cpc_clicks.name: total_cpc_clicks

total_home_page_views.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when length(page_path)=1 or  regexp_like(page_path , '^.*(en-|-en|shop).*') then page else null end)
total_home_page_views.name: total_home_page_views

total_initiatecheckout.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'InitiateCheckout' and regexp_like(page, '^.*(information).*') then page else null end)
total_initiatecheckout.name: total_initiatecheckout

total_login_page_views.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'PageView' and regexp_like(page_path , '^.*(account|login|register|reset|activate).*') then page else null end)
total_login_page_views.name: total_login_page_views

total_orders.aggregation_operation: count(distinct (case when event_name in ('Purchase') then data_order_id else null end))
total_orders.name: total_orders

total_page_views.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'PageView' then page else null end)
total_page_views.name: total_page_views

total_pdp_views.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'ViewContent' then page else null end)
total_pdp_views.name: total_pdp_views

total_ppc_clicks.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when referrer_by_type in ('ppc') then coalesce(search_fbclid,search_gclid,clickid) else null end)
total_ppc_clicks.name: total_ppc_clicks

total_search_page_views.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'PageView' and regexp_like(page, '^.*(search|searches).*') then page else null end)
total_search_page_views.name: total_search_page_views

total_signups.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when event_name = 'CompleteRegistration' and regexp_like(page_path , '^.*(account|register).*') then page else null end)
total_signups.name: total_signups

total_visits_from_ads.aggregation_operation: count(distinct case when ad_id is not null or referrer_by_category in ('Ad Campaigns') then session_id end)
total_visits_from_ads.name: total_visits_from_ads

title: Daily Insights for KPI Set 1 in Blotout for TrueClassic
